metadata.synopsis: The second goblin just died of poison, but the goblin who said this thinks he just drank too much and fell asleep.

0.text: Another one down?! You pisspots can't 'old your drink. Shameful.
0.context: NodeContext: This goblin is laughing at the goblins who just fell down. Heavily slurred even as he lambasts his friends for being drunk. (A belch in there somewhere might be nice)
